[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [IPv6Address](./format.ipv6address.md)

## IPv6Address class

The IPv6Address formatter based on RFC 4291 and RFC 5954.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IPv6Address 
```

## Example


```ts
IPv6Address.parse("::1"); // { segments: ["1"], compressIndex: 0, embeddedIPv4: undefined }
```
